return.description:
An associative array of all the HTTP headers in the current request, or
   FALSE on failure.

notes.description:
As of PHP 4.3.3 you can use this function with the
NSAPI server module in Netscape/iPlanet/SunONE
webservers, too.

changelog.change:
Became an alias for apache_request_headers.
        Essentially, it was renamed.  This is because this function
        only works with Apache.
